1.content: Before we start, are you a boy or girl?
1.title: are you a boy? or girl?

11.content:
"Ahhh! a high school life!"

That was what you said when you reached the Ootomi high school, the school in hokkaido, japan that only the rich people goes to. It was a luck that you, the middle class boy, to be here. The only reason why you got to this school is because back in your middle school days, the principle have some how convinced the principle of the Ootomi to take you in. As you walked into the school ground, you saw many students in good suits as male wore an black top and good pants with the school emblem on his shoulder while the ladies wore a navy blue top and a long skirt with a school emblem on her chest. You were excited for a new class and once you got into the building, you changed the shoes into indoor shoes and walked through the hallway. You noticed some students whispering each other and you overheard one of them talking.

"Hey, do you see him? that's the middle-class boy that were accepted here in Ootomi." Male student whispered.

"Hell, I don't even know why a guy like him were accepted." Female student whispered back.

You really didn't care about what they say: you were in the prestigious school! the school that both your parents and your big sis who went to america to go to there collage. You went to the principles office and meet the principle. It was a women in good blue shirt with white shirt inside, and had a long blue skirt. Her name was Sachiko Hanamichi, 45 years old and she smiled at you.

"Ah, you're hear mr....Kondo Ayakami." Sachiko said.

"Yes, at present!" You replied.

She giggled and told you to come with her. You slightly knew Ms.Sachiko since she was your mothers colleague during her days. You wondered maybe that was the reason you got into this school. As you two walked, the students and the teachers greeted her and she greeted back.

"How is this school, young man?" Sachiko asked.

"Oh, it's great! I cant wait for my freshmen year to start!" You replied in excitement.

She giggled again and then both of you went to the main gym area. You departed with sachiko and once you got to the freshmen line, you saw sachiko go to the podeium. She coughed and spoke up.

"Good morning, students of Ootomi. I am Sachiko Hanamichi, your principle. Students from sophmores to seniors already know me, and I do hope you seniors graduate from this school successfully while juniors learn hard to take place, and sophmores continue to smile and study while freshemn have a new experience." Sahicko said.

You and the rest of the students clapped there hands. Sachiko spoke some news and before it was over, sachiko spoke up to the students.

"Now then. Students from sophmores to seniors, you can go home since today is just an entrace speech. Freshmens, please stay put for moment." Sachiko said.

You wondered why she said that, and after all the sophmores, juniors and seniors left, two other teachers came to sachiko and she spoke up.

"Freshmens, listen up. This school is not an ordinary school that you know. This is a school where you have your own shikigami as your partners, who will help you with study and so forth." Sachiko said.

The students mumbled as you and them were surprised to hear that. Sachiko continued to talk that she will take students one by one to give them the specific shikigami to own. As the line were made, you were the last. You sighed but didn't care as you liked to wait. As you came to the principle, she gave you a paper with four picture.

"Now then, you have a choice: an bakeneko, tanooki, inari, or an oni. Bakeneko is very friendly and always keep you away from being sad. Tanooki is laid back so when your stressed out, you can always lean on her. An inari have morals so if you need help with study, you can count on her. And the oni is the strongest, so if you need someone to defend you, she is the one." Sachiko said.

You thought for minute and decided to have...
11.title: New life, new expectation

111.content:
..The bakeneko since you were a cat person. You told the princeple and she nodded and she snapped her finger. One of the instructor gave you the black/gold colored egg with the school emblem on the middle. You looked closely and noticed the egg started to crack and bursted with light! As the light faded away, you saw nothing but the shattered egg shells.

"Where's the shikigami?" You spoke.

Just then you heard a purring noise from floor. You looked down and saw a long black haired girl rubbing her face to your leg. You jumped little as she was also naked and her skin were slightly tanned with brown color and had a two cat tails and ears. She looked up and then stood up looking at you with her golden iris.

"Thanks for choosing me master!" Cat girl said.

You trembled little as you didn't know it was a girl as a shikigami. The instructor told you the shiki can turn to normal cat or to human being so she could talk to you. Sachiko chuckled and clapped her hands to you with a warm smile.

"Well done, mr.ayakami. Now then, why don't you name that cute shikigami?" Sachiko said.

You thought for moment as you saw the girl looking at you and smiled. Her smile surly throbbed your heart and blood came down from your nose. Sachiko saw this and came to you and gave you some tissues. You thanked her and once you put it in your nose, you thought of one.

"Ok then, how about kuro?" You sadi.

"Kuro huh? I like it, thank you." She replied, as she waved her tail

Sachiko then provided the cloth for the girl and you two parted and left. You were walking through the sidewalk with your new shikigami who were holding your hand. As you got home and got inside, you were greeted by...
111.title: prrretty girl

1112.content:
...A short black haired women with jeans and long white shirt on. It was your mother Umi Ayakami who was an stay-at-home mother who took care of you while your dad, Hiroshi Ayakami, worked most of the time. You respected both umi and hiroshi as they worked hard to keep you safe from the bad side of the street. You heard from her that Ms.Sachiko was the childhood friend to Umi and when she realised that her best friends son were close to graduating middle school, she done every paper work and waved the tuition so you can go into the super-elite high school.

"Welcome back, kondo." Umi spoke.

"Thanks." You replied.

Umi then noticed kuro and your cat shikigami became very shy and hid behind you. You felt her hand tugging your shirt and when you looked at her you saw her looking at umi with little blush on her face. You could tell she was a shy person, and You smiled as umi spoke to the young shikigami.

"Hello there young friend. What's your name?" Umi asked.

"Mm..." kuro mumbled, tugging your shirt harder.

You giggled and petted her head. She looked at you and you spoke to her, telling her that she was your mother. Kuro thought for moment and then released you, taking two steps and bowed lightly.

"I..I am Kuro, your sons cat shikigami! Please be gentle with me!" Kuro greeted.

Umi smiled and came to her. Kuro looked at her chestnut eyes as umi tilted her head, she put her hand on the cat shikigamis head and scuffled it. Kuro felt the softness of the hand and the gentle stroke that made it felt good, she meowed few time.

"I'm happy to hear this, kuro-chan." Umi said, "I am Umi, nice to meet you."

Kuro blushed and smiled, accepting her as part of the life. You told your mother about what happened at school as you got into the house, she was surprised to hear this and congratulated you for being accepted by the school. She then told you two that she will start making lunch so she went to the kitchen. You then went to...
1112.title: your mother

choices: Your mom comes in and is lunch time
Your sister comes in to see you
11121.content:
You then decided to go to your room to rest for a little bit. It looks like any typical room that a high schooler would expect to have, and also a boys room as well. A bed, a computer, a tv, a console for video gaming, and all sorts of other stuff that you can imagine. Right now you just want to relax for several minutes just so you can relax your mind on the whole thing of getting to the elite high school. There is surely going to be some time to study soon for the big day, but for now you just want to relax.

"Ah..... this is going to be good. Getting into a super elite high school is great, but its also a weird story how I got there." I thought, just as I rest my eyes for a few moments, then suddenly..
11121.title: Your room

1113.content:
...A long, black haired women with chestnut eyes stood. It was your big sister Miku Ayakami, a collage student who were taking the medical field. Since your parents went out for the business trip, miku volunteered to look after you. Even though you wanted to be independant, you had the theory that your parent would be doubting you so they called miku.

"Welcome back, little bro." Miku said.

"Thanks sis." You replied.

Miku then noticed kuro and came to her. You sweated little while miku looked at the bakeneko. Kuro looked up little and saw your sisters chest. Miku had the grandmothers genes, where your mothers side of family were tall like a giantess and busty.

"Who are you?" Miku asked.

"I'm kuro, I'm masters shikigami." kuro responded.

Miku were surprised to hear that and turned to you. You explained to your sister about what was going on and within 5 minutes, miku sighed and turned to kuro.

"Well...since your his shiki..be nice or my fist will do the talking." Miku said.

She turned around and left the scene. Kuro looked at her chest and patted little and looked at you with little teary. You could tell that she had...smaller chest chest size then your sister, then kuro came to you.

"M-master..will you not abandon me for my small chest, would you?" Kuro asked.

"N-no! never!" you replied.

The cuteness that kuro showed you were making you blush. She then asked why miku were strict, and you told her she want to protect you alot since she felt that it was her duty as a big sister to protect. You also told her she was good with k-1 mixed martial art. Just then, miku called you two to come to the kitchen and once you two got to the area, you saw..
1113.title: Big Sis

11131.content:
"Guys, snack is ready." Miku spoke.

You two went in and saw a grilled fish sitting on the table. You then noticed kuro drooling as she was looking at the fish. You sighed with smiled and both of you went to the table and sat on the chair. The fish were mackerel and it also had a bowl of rice and miso soup next to it.

"It's look like an breakfast." You spoke.

"Meh, you can call that if you want." miku replied, "Enjoy."

You nodded and both of you thanked for the food and started to eat. The flavors were actually not bad, and when you looked at kuro you realized she was eating with confidence. She chewed the fish little long and then swallowed it with rice. You then saw her tail wagging little then you smiled.

"Is it good?" You asked.

"Yep, it's tasty." Kuro replied.

You nodded and resumed eating. After the snack, miku told you that you should go upstairs to get ready for the school tomorrow. You understood and thanked for the food and went to your room. while you were getting ready for the school, someone knocked on the door and opened the door. It was kuro and she was sweating little.

"Um...master?" Kuro spoke.

"Yeah?" You asked.

"Your elder sister invited me to do some shopping...is it ok for me to go?" Kuro asked.

You answered...
11131.title: light snack.

111311.content:
You had good intention that kuro might be a sociable person. You smiled and nodded to her, giving her the permission. Kuro wagged her tails and thanked you and left for shopping. 2 hours passed and she came back with bag full of clothes.

"Did you had good time?" You asked.

"Yes master. Your sister is truly helpful and sociable." Kuro responded.

You chuckled and came to her, petting her head. She purred lightly as it felt good, you got off from her.

"What should we do now, master?" Kuro asked.

You thought for moment, then a door rang. You and kuro wondered who was in front, and you two went down, your sis was there speaking with...
111311.title: yes

11132.content:
"Ah... good old rice balls." you said as you admit loving rice balls. The cat then started to look at the rice balls just like a bit of a Kirby like look, and then Miku then comes to the cat. "Say, I think you are sure to like rice-balls, so give one a shot little one." Miku smiled at her before giving her a rice-ball. Everyone sat at the dining table and everyone started to eat their rice-balls. Everyone thought they were delicious, as they taste great and all that other stuff, however... Kuro had this reaction.

"Wow, this is seriously my most favorite thing I have ever ate in my whole life. And in case you might ask, I can never be sad at all, I am always happy and cheerful." Kuro then told Miku. "So I will get along with him just fine." she smiled like a little bunny. Miku then came to the cat and hugged her.

"Wow, you admittly look so cute when you are a cat. Say, lets get to know each other a bit more." Miku smiled just before she and Kuro left to talk. You then decide to go to your room and study, knowing the day tomorrow will be a big one.
11132.title: Good old Rice Balls

choices: Getting adjusted to high school life
111321.content:
You were asleep on your bed, and then moments later the alarm goes off. Well, this is the typical start to a typical day at school. You get up, eat breakfast, get dressed, etc. One thing that you were told yesterday just before you left the school that you don't have to bring your special "friend" if you don't want to, so you decided that she would watch over your sister while you go on with your day.

"Say, can you watch my friend please?" you asked your sister. "Sure thing." Miku replied,a nd then hugs the cat one more again. "You and I are going to have so much fun today. Alright... get along." Miku then said to her, then the last part to you. You then go on to start your new day at school. You report to your homeroom teacher after getting to the school, and you sat in front of the teacher's desk as you like to be close to the board.

What is going to be the first lesson of the day?
111321.title: Starting the first "actual" day

1113211.content:
Your first class was history class as you were walking through the hallway, you saw many students with their own shikigami. The types ranged from normal cat shikigami to more exquisite types like crane or rare species. You wondered if leaving kuro behind was a right thing to do, but you assured yourself that it was good since she would have a nice time with your big sis. As you got into the classroom, you noticed there were some students looking at you as if they don't like you but you didn't care as you ignored them and sat on the proper seat. Moment later, an elder man with white shirt and khaki jeans came in with a middle-aged women with turtle shell on her back came in.

"Welcome students. Sophmores and upperclassman might know me, but to freshmens, I am Gonsuke Tamamichino and this is my genbu shikigami Shichi. It's an honor to meet you all." He spoke.

You and other students muttered and then Gonsuke told them to pipe down and get the text to get started. As the class started, you noticed some students giggling. You kinda had feeling they were giggling about you, but you tried to do your best to keep it to yourself. After 45 minutes, the chime were made and gonsuke spoke up.

"You won't have any homework from me today, but be sure to be prepaired tomorrow." Gonsuke said.

The all agreed and you left the room, and your next class were..
1113211.title: New life at Ootomi

11132111.content:
You went to math class next, and just like the last one, you sat in the front of the class room, ready to see your new teacher come in. The new teacher was named Dr. Shimura and he is like a Japan like man with brown hair and was wearing a suit today. He comes to his desk and now announces his class. "Hello, I am Dr. Koen Shimura, and I will be your pre-calcus teacher, and today we are going to start with the basics of pre-calcus."

The class goes on and on for 40 minutes, and then the last 5 minutes of class, you all took a quiz. Great, a quiz on your first day, but hey, you never know. "You have 5 minutes to complete your quiz by yourself, begin." he announced.

After 5 minutes was up, you got done with your quiz and you handed it to Shimura. "I must say, I am impressed on how you did it. You are the first student to get a 100 on the surprise quiz." Shimura replied, and then he gets the other quizzes, and then you go on to your next class.

What is your next class?
11132111.title: Knowing how to succeed

112.content:
You decided to take the tanooki as it was very interesting choice. You told Ms.Sachiko what you wanted and once the principle told the employee to bring the egg, he did and handed over the egg to you. The egg was little heavy as the egg brown with black stripes and it had the school emblem on it. Ms.Sachiko congratulated you for getting accepted here in the academy and told you the egg will hatch in the midnight. You understood and was about to leave until you felt the egg start to move. You looked at the egg and it wiggled more and then suddenly the egg started to make some crack. You turned to ms.sachiko and she noticed it as well and the egg made more crack and it burst the whole gym with the light. You and others covered the eyes as the light faded away everyone lowered the arm only to realise the egg was nothing more then the scattered shell on the floor.

"Huh? what happened to the egg?" You said.

You then suddenly felt something soft on your arm. You turned around and saw the wavy brown haired teen girl with tanuki ears, tail and had both good rack and plump stomach. You blushed as she was also naked and tried not to be too embarrassed as she smiled toward you.

"You must be the one who chose me as the shikigami. I thank you." Girl said.

"N-no problem." You responded.

You introduced yourself to her and she nodded, continuing to hug your arm. You were still embaressed by this and ms.sachiko came to you. She was astonished to see such thing and then thinking about trying to find out what caused this.

"Hm....anyway, congradulation on your new shikigami Mr.Kondo. Now why don't you name your new shikigami?" Ms.Sachiko asked.

"Name huh?...how about.....shiro?" You said.

"I love it master. I hope we'll be best of friend." Shiro replied.

You nodded and ms.sachiko told the employee to give the tanuki a cloth. Once they did, you and shiro bid farewell to the principle and left the scene. You and Shiro talked while walking and once you arrived at your home you were greeted by..
112.title: new shikigami

1123.content:
..A long black haired girl that was around your age and had sweater and sweatpants on. Her name was Kusanagi Tomoko, your childhood friend since kindergarten. You knew her as she did always looked up on you as she was not a popular girl. Once she found out that you were accepted to Ootomi academy, she cried a lot since she was not accepted by the school. You were surprised to see her again and she smiled and came to you.

"Hi Kondo kun." Tomoko greeted.

"Hey Kusanagi san." You replied.

"You can call me tomoko, you know?" She replied.

"I know." You replied.

As you and your shikigami passes her, tomoko looked at shiro. Tomoko didn't know who she was as shiro lightly bowed to her, she asked you that she could help. You gave her your bag and told her to take it to your room as you gave direction, she saluted and went upstairs to drop off the book bag. Tomoko looked at shiro walking up the stairs, her tail looked comfy to her and then turned to you.

"Kondo kun? who's she? is she your new friend or something?" Tomoko asked.

"She's my tanuki shikigami." You responded as you got to the kitchen and getting the bottle of tea.

"Sh-shikigami!!??" Tomoko said with surprised tone.

You explained to her about what's behind the campus and what they do as you took out the pamphlet of the Ootomi academy, you gave it to your childhood friend. She looked through the pamphlet and you gave her the light book on the rules and conducts of the academy and its shikigami. After she looked through, she closed the book and gave it back to you.

"You are so lucky, kondo kun. I truly wished I could come along with you." Tomoko said.


"Hey, who knows? Maybe you can ask the principle to be transferred." You replied.

"Are you kidding? the rate of the transfer from normal high school to such extravagant academy as Ootomi is less then 5%!" Tomoko replied.

That was surprising to you even though you know that the Ootomi Academy was an elite high school for rich and powerful. You wondered if you were truly lucky to be even enrolled by the school itself! She sighed and turned around.

"Even more, the school session is so different as your session starts in fall instead of spring, so you have few weeks to yourself while others work hard." Tomoko said.

"Hey, at least I have to study more harder then you guys." You said, "Besides, I'm not going to look down on you or others just because I got into the good high school."

Tomoko looked at you slowly and hugged you. She was always emotional as even the lightest love story would make her cry. You petted her head as tomoki got off from you, you noticed a written paper on the table. You picked it up and noticed that it was written by your parents. They written that they are going to Tokyo to do some business. You sighed as you put the paper down, you stretched.

"What's that?" Tomoko asked.

"My parents will be out for while." You replied.

Hearing that, tomoko immediately told you that she'll take care of the house as she would be an house keeper until your parents come back. You told her she don't have to but she insisted. You sighed and let her do what she wanted, and once she told you she'll start making something for light lunch, you went to your room to see what shiro was doing.

Once you got in you saw shiro...
1123.title: meeting friend

11232.content:
..Beating on her plump belly. It sounded extraordinary as her belly were more swollen and everytime her hand banged on the belly it felt like she was beating on the taiko drums. You remember the legend that when tanuki were happy they will show their fat belly and beat it so it could be used as an instrument to have a great time on their own private festival or have some humans fun. She continued to beat her belly drum and noticed you and stopped.

"H-Hi master, you...you heard that?" Shiro asked.

"Yeah." You replied.

She blushed little and her fat belly turned back into her usual plump size and covered it with her tail. She was embarrassed that you've seen her do the belly drum and her face was blushing. You were little blushed as well and you came to her and sat next to her. You pet her shoulder and once she looked at you and you smiled to her.

"Don't worry shiro, I won't say anything bad about what you were doing." You said, "Besides, I like the sound of the taiko drums and yours were like one."

"But...I've done this out of my feral instinct." Shiro said, "It's too embaresing for me, being a female doing this kind of thing to you, a male."

You scruffled her head as you told her if you heard her doing this kind again you would just leave her alone. She thanked you and once she put the shirt on, you and shiro heard tomoko call you two down. Once you and shiro came down toward the living room you saw tomoko with...
11232.title: belly taiko

112322.content:
..Three Bowls of tanuki soba. It smelled nice as she loved cooking and when you looked at shiro you saw her drooling and her tanuki tail wagging. You smiled as she noticed as well and chuckled. You and shiro came to the table and sat down on the chair, thanked for the food and started to eat the soba noodles. Tomoko was happy to see you admitted to the good high school and were little jealous that you now have an shikigami as your partner. She then had the idea that you would do something naughty in the night and got little paranoid.

'Will he do it in the night? what if he did??' tomoko thought.

"something wrong?" You asked.

Tomoko got to her sense and fluttered little. Shiro looked at her fluttering face and lightly smiled as she might understand what she was thinking or why she was thinking that way then turned to your attention.

"Master, will you permit me to go out for the tour of sapporo with master tomoko?" Shiro asked.

"Huh?" tomoko spoke.

"Sure, why not? I have to prepare for tomorrow." You replied.

You had thought that shiro might have a good tour to understand the area more while you prepare for the school for tomorrow. After the lunch, you told tomoko you would clean the bowl and she nodded, getting ready and both tomoko and shiro bid farewell to you and left as you bid them farewell and went to the kitchen to start washing some bowls. Outside, Tomoko was giving shiro a good tour around the city of sapporo from good eatery and scenery. Shiro liked this tour as they were in Oodori park, they were sitting on the bench sipping on canned coffee tomoko bought.

"So what do you think about the city, shiro san?" tomoko asked.

"It is very nice to live. Thank you for the tour, master tomoko." Shiro replied with smile.

"You..don't have to call me master, you know?" tomoko said.

"As long as master is my master, I shall respect his friends." Shiro replied.

Tomoko just laughed lightly and took some sip of coffee. It was little chilly as it was the beginning of the fall and tomoko was already at the school since her school starts in spring. It was sunday and the school was off so tomoko had time to see you. Just as tomoko and shiro was about to go back to your house, they saw four people standing. It was two male students from the Ootomi Academy with their shikigami, one was bakeneko and other was wolf shikigami and they were blocking the way.

"Excuse me, please let me by!" Tomoko said.

"Well, not only that poor boy got into the Ootomi, but this poor bitch is in it too? how lame." Boy said.

"Yeah, so lame!" Wolf shikigami spoke.

She was little confused as they were mistaken her as being part of the Ootomi student since shiro was next to her. Shiro just huffed as she was silent, tomoko came in front.

"For your information, I'm not a student at Ootomi." Tomoko said.

"Then why the fuck you have the shikigami? only the Ootomi Academy distributes them." Other boy said, "Anyway, maybe we could use you for little fun time before the school starts."

They came toward her and grabbed her arm. She gotten mad and slapped him and threw him to the side. The male student got mad and leap forward tomoko but she quickly took a jab on his stomach. He coughed as he backed off little, shiro was surprised to see her fighting. Tomoko breathed out and made knuckles as she took a stance.

"don't think I can't fight. My parents is Japans Self Defense Force and my grandpa was part of the imperial army!" Tomoko said.

"Is that true?" shiro asked.

She smiled and nodded, and they were about to leave until the bakeneko caught tomoko by back. Shiro tried to get her off but the wolf got her back as well, making it little hard. The two students got up slowly and came toward tomoko as she struggled, the shikigamis power were very strong and couldn't get out of it.

"you bitch, you asked for it!" Male student spoke.

He then slapped her face. She endured the pain as he slapped twice more, shiro gotten little angry and chanted few words and the smoke screen were made, surrouding the area. The two boys and tomoko coughed as the smoke was thick, the boys heard their own shikigami scream in pain and once the smoke was gone they saw their own shikigami beaten to the pulp and tomoko gone.

"Where is that bitch!?" student spoke.

"Looking for us?"

The shadow overloomed the boys and they turned and looked up, seeing the huge shiro standing before them. The two boys were in deep fear as shiro revealed her feral side, her skin covered with animal skin and her brown, relaxed eyes turned bloody red with rage. Tomoko was very surprised to see the shikigami in this state and she was looking down at the two boys.

"Leave this girl be, or I will not hesitate to eat you!" Shiro spoke.

They gotten more scared and got their shikigami and ran off. The tanuki sighed and put the teenage girl down and the smoke made again, and once it was gone tomoko saw her to her normal size, but her belly were no longer plump but had some abs on.

"Shiro san...your belly.." Tomoko spoke.

"For me to use that kind of power, I need alot of youkai power. I keep my belly plump to store my youkai power within me." shiro said.

"And how do you keep your youkai power stored?" Shiro asked.

"Food and drink is one, and clean air is second." Shiro replied, "I might need to eat soon so I could reenergize my power."

She smiled and told her that she could eat more later. She thanked her and went back home..
112322.title: Food.

1123221.content:
Back at the house you were just finishing the ironing the school uniform. You were still can't believe that you were accepted to the Ootomi as it was one of the most prestigious high school in the history of japan, even the Tokyo University and other high end university beg for the graduates from Ootomi to come to their school. You were smiling as you put the uniform to the wall, you then remembered that there were no uniform for shiro.

"Oh man, I should ask ms.sachiko for the spare." You aid.

Just as you put things away, you heard the door open from the front. You knew they were back and you came down from the room, noticing some little red mark on tomoko. You sensed something happened to her and came to her to understand what happened to her while she and shiro were out.

"What happened? did something happened to you?" You asked.

She didn't say anything and shiro stepped forward.

"Some rich students from Ootomi threatened her. I have defended her by scaring them away." Shiro said.

You were shocked to hear that as you hated people who threatened your childhood friend. You thanked shiro and was about to get back at them for doing such thing, but tomoko lightly grabbed your shoulder. you looked at her and noticed she was little sad but had the no-fear attitude in her eyes.

"Don't worry Kondo kun, Shiro san defended me so everythings ok." Tomoko said.

"..are you sure?" You asked.

She smiled and nodded. You sighed and accepted her words as you quickly noticed shiros abs. She told you what caused this and tomoko told you from now until your parents come back from business, she'll handle housework and cooking when she finishes both school and cram school. You told her she didn't have to but she was determinted to do it. You nodded and all of you relaxed until the sun started to go down. Tomoko bid farewell and went home as you turned and made an quick dinner and once you and shiro ate the dinner you two done taking bath, brushing teeth and changing to pajamas and went to bed.

Next morning came, and once you two got up you put your uniform on. You apologized to shiro that you didn't have the uniform for her but she chuckled and used few magic and transformed her pajamas to some sort of kimono (http://orig01.deviantart.net/4da6/f/2014...)

"That's neat." you said.

You nodded and both of you went down and got quick breakfast and got your bag and went out. You two noticed some fancy cars that the students rode with their shikigami and once you two passed through them you two changed shoes and went through the hallway as you looked at the map you got to the homeroom. Once you opened the door you saw many students talking with other classmates while shikigami did the same.

11232211.content:

The look made the student shiver in hindsight and quickly apologized to you, shiro and ms.moriyama and went back to his seat. As you were listening, Isamu notice some students whispering about something at one end of the room. Then an eye open on his orb and started to walk over as the eye stare at them.

"H-how did you knew my name?" The student said.

"Eep!" Shiro spoke in fear.

You turned around and saw an amazonian female with long chestnut hairs and has one horn sticking out of her forehead. It was a oni and you were scared as well.

"Hurry up and get changed. The locker room is that way." The oni said.

"Yes ma'am!" You said.

You and Shiro walked towards the locker room and went in. You breathed in and out, giving you the chill that you just saw a real oni, the infamous youkai that could lift mountains! Or at least you heard stories about that.

"Wow, that... was scary master!" Shiro said.

"I know right? Lets hurry up and change. Don't want to keep her waiting." you replied.

You two then changed from normal cloth to the gym uniform. Once you two changed, you and Shiro went to the class and in a moment, a man in his early 40's came with the same oni you two saw.

"Hello there children. I'm Mr.Okazu and she is my oni shikigami Chikara." He said.

He then taking the attendance and called for the students name. Afterwards, mr.Okazu gave the attendance sheet to Chikara and nodded.

He put his energy and threw at your direction. You noticed that the other students were not dare to defend you but they were not aware that you were actually physically fit, so you got to your position and caught the ball. It made him out and other students couldn't believe your action as both mr.okazu and chikara was seeing as the referee and they were surprised to see you play good. You also know that when you graduate from this school many other prestigious collage will start begging you to come to their collage just for the bragging rights.

"Not that hungry?" Shizue asked.

"Mmm....just little stress, that's all." Ryou replied.

He nodded and she turned back to get some tea. Mana slurped on her chanpon noodles and started to drink some soup then put the bowl down with some relaxation.

The Ootomi academic principle.

"Who was it, master?" Mana asked.

"My parents. They said they would not be back for while." Ryou responded.

112322112212121121.content:
2 weeks passes since your first day and you were getting used to the high school life. The students continued to harass you but thanks to shiro and the student council the harassment went down little. During the homeroom your teacher told you and the class that the students have an manditory enrollment to the club activity so they will get some credits for collages and the entrance would start on Tuesday. There were many club presidents occupying the room and made stalls to advertise their clubs, there were many students rushing for the right one.

you then started to look for the club search as many students were rushing to get their applications and the search. You looked high and low to find the good clubs but you couldn't find one as they were all filled up. You were looking more then you saw a teenage girl that were around your age, mid-long black hair with pony tail on her side head and had chestnut eyes. "What else? this is fight club, and I am Chihiro Senshiro and he is tetsu my tiger shikigami!" She said.

You were surprised that such club existed. You were not really a fighter but you always wanted to learn how to do some self defence. You tried to go to the karate or judo club but they were full and you didn't know who you could go into until now you see the young girl. Shiro was still in her defensive position as tetsu stepped forward in case if she was about to attack, chihiro just giggled.

You and others turned and saw a short purple haired girl with indigo eyes step forward with her shiro inu shikigami. You and shiro didn't know who this person were until chihiro spoke up.

"Geh, Asuna kirishakuji and that mutt motou." chihiro spoke.

She then nodded, "She's the president of literature club. She and I are rivals since kindergarten and she try to steal my hopeful!"

"I have already got 5! I guess you don't have any!" Chihiro said.

"For your information, I already got 5 as well!" asuna replied.

They were already were close to each other. You could tell they were serious and not going to go away, and when you were little panicky, you noticed shizue in the crowed looking at the girls close with her katana ready. You could tell she'll come after them if they don't calm down. You then immediatly came to them and separated the two girls from each other.

"Look, don't do this right now!" You said, "It's not worth it!"

" " IT'S WORTH IT!!!" "

The girls voice were loud and were about to fight until they gotten an idea. They smiled and quickly turned to your attention as you saw them looking at you straight as they were looking through your brain.

"New kid! I want you to join our fight club!" chihiro said, "If you do, you're status will go up very quick!"

"Young sir, if you join our literature club, you will be respected by many students and faculty." Asuna said.

You couldn't decide quickly as they were staring at you, you turned to your shikigami only to see her shaking her head. You had little time to decide as you thought for moment you decided to join...

1123221122121211212.title: Literature club

..A book about the history of Ootomi academy. You were curious about the book and took it out and went to the open seat. Shiro followed you as you got to the seat and sat down, you opened the book and started to read little. You were intrigued by it and as you got finished reading the introduction, you started to read the first chapter of the book:

The ootomi private academy, which once called the ootomi academy for boys and youkai, is considered to be the oldest operational school in the japanese history. Legend speaks that the academy were found and erected by the legendary warrior Yamato Takeru during his journey home, while others says that it was created by prince shoutoku, but many historians agree the theory that it was created during the nara period, run by the shinto priests and priestesses. It had long history of peace until the buddhist monks and priests took over the academy in 1459. They strongly implemented the buddhist teachings until 1760 where the taoists drove them out and controlled the school until 1919, where the shinto priests regained the school and controlled the academy since then.


"this is interesting start, master." Shiro said.

"It is." You replied, then continued to read.

During the early days of Ootomi, many youkais who once hid themselves from the humans or done some evil deeds, came to the academy to have truce between the humans and themselves. Humans felt little uneasy but gave in and worked together. The buddhists have implemented some minor change such as putting a statue of buddha on the main hall and putting new academic rules including club activities. The taoists brought dicipline and strict order in the academy, and once the shinto brought back the school to them, they took down the buddhist statue and taoist reference, but kept the idea to the schoo. Diciplinary commitee room

1131112222111211112122121111121.content:
You had some thoughts on how the school were made. You looked at kyoko and she was wagging her tails, then she noticed you. She blushed little and looked down, minding her own business. You sighed and then turned to ryou.

"How did this school started? I never heard the history from the principle." You asked.

Ryou leaned back as mana came to you two and served you and kyoko some tea. You and kyoko thanked her as you took the tea, ryou got back up.

"This school was made in early 5th century, run by the shinto priests and priestesses. It ran only by them until year 654, where the buddhist forced them out and replaced the religion from shinto to buddhism. It ran for at least 250 years until the taoist took them out and controlled the area from 904 to 1864, making the longest religious people controled it. After japan opened itself, the shinto reclaimed the school by the order of the emperor and the royal family chose one of the intelligious and rich person to be the principle, and the principle is the current descendant of that person." ryou said.

You were suprised to hear that then had one thoght: on the shikigami.

"Then what about the shikigami? isn't that impossible to aquire during the buddhist and taoist rule?" You asked.

"That is true." Sakura said, "But there was a way."

"How?" Kyoko asked.

"The buddhist and the taoist had noticed the ritual the shinto priest and priestess were doing and made a decision that they should be kept in the school. Hypocritical, yes, but they kept the tradition of the human/shikigami system." miku replied.

You were astonished to hear that and then ryou spoke up.

"In 1946, the principle that time enforced the ranking system to see the harmony between the student and the shikigami. It worked well for while until 1949 where douglas maccarthur tried to americanize the school. The principle refused such thing, so he created a student council where it decided into three catiogory: Educational committee, disciplinary committee and financial committee. They worked hard to defend against the american government. Fortunatly, it worked and the american government leaft us alone, and it became privatized in 1953. Since then, the students and the shikigami have worked together in harmony." Ryou said.

You nodded and sipped on the tea, then the bell rang. You knew that the homeroom were over and the first class were starting. As you got up to get excused, miku chuckled and sakura spoke up.

"Hey, if you want some advice and such, come to the disciplinary committee, ok?" sakura said.

"Sure." You replied.

Sakura smiled and bot hyou and kyoko left to go to the first class. After few hours, you were now at the cafeteria and once you sat down with kyoko, you saw someone coming.

It was..

You asked ryou on one thing: How did the rank worked in this school? Ryou layed back as sakura sipped the tea, her dog shikigami took out three doughnuts and put it next to her. Sakura thanked her shikigami as miku sighed at her, ryou leaned forward.

you and kyoko wondered what he ment until a knock on the door was made. Ryou spoke come and it opened, revealing one of the staff of the school and came in. You and kyoko gave him away and he looked at you for moment and then turned to ryou.

'master..'

In the school meeting room, Ms.Sachiko and many associates were there to have meeting. They had the meeting on what happened at the school today as there were some blood spilled during class, and the parents were complaining about it. Ms.Sachiko, with help of the disciplinary committee, experience and her knowladge, quelled the angry parents. The staff included Ms.Moriyama, Ms.Haruka, Mr.Okazu and Mr.Tetsutaro, and their respective shikigami stood on the wall.

"..So the parents were quelled down. It's a good thing, madam principle." Mr.Tetsutaro said.

"Yeah, good thing those little fucks fear the principle." Ms.Moriyama said.

Ms.Sachiko didn't say anything as Ms.Haruka warned her about the swearing. Ms.Moriyama just made an 'tch' noise and leaned back on the chair. Ms.Moriyama thought for moment and then nodded.

"Although it IS lucky that we quelled down the parents. But it was not just me, but the records showened by the disciplinary committee is back up as well." Ms.Sachiko replied, "And since the inari is detained, it will be not bad."

"What would that do, muscle head?" Ms.Moriyama asked

Mr.Okazu just looked at her, and she just snickered. Ms.Sachiko clapped her hands, telling them to stop and she rose up.

"The privacy of the students are valuable thing, but we do not want to see the same incident that occured 2 years ago." Ms.Sachiko said.

They went silent, knowing what she ment. As the silence lingered, isamu tapped his masters shoulder and whispered something. Moment later, Ms.Haruka nodded and turned her attention to the principle.

"Madam principle, if I may, can I take off now?" ms.Ayaka asked.

Ms.Sachiko wondered why, then turned to isamu who were blushing. She remembered something and smiled, then sat down again.

"Well...Only thing I can say is to watch on eyes on Mr.Ayakami and his inari shikigami." Ms.Sachiko said, "Meeting, ajourned."

The teachers and the shiki bowed, and everyone left. Back in your house, you were laying down on the bed. It was 10:30 pm and you finished homework, but couldn't sleep. You were thinking too much about kyoko until your cellphone rang. You got the cellphone and noticed it was from..

Just then, few minutes of paper work and you were now part of the council. You then went back to the cafeteria to eat lunch..

You immediately noticed that she was mildly muscular and the male with burgundy/orange/white dress with a tiger pattern around the abdomen along with white, long pants under his dress and black shoes on his feet. The female went to the teachers desk, put her work down and came to the front.

You were getting annoyed until...

"I'm alright Mana, I just get annoyed when the underclassmen rant on stuff that aren't really issues." Ryou said calmly.

"Look, I don't know what's going on but please don't make any trouble." You whipsered.

It was an male student with inari as his shikigami. You came to him as sakura felt something from the fox and lightly grabbed your arm. "You must be the freshmen I heard from. I am Ryouhei Tsuzuka, but people call me ryou." Ryou spoke, "And this is my shikigami Mana, and we're juniors."

Sakura bowed lightly as well and mana smiled and bowed as well. You have some feeling that this junior not an normal student but very powerful one that nobody should even mess with. Ryou observed you for moment and then spoke up to you.

"The reason I'm here to talk so I could be acquainted with you." Ryou said, "I do trust we could be a good friend?"

You were surprised to hear that because you thought he would act like other students as harassment or tease you. You were glad at least there were more people that were descent. "By the way, sempai. What is that badge on your chest?" You asked.

"This badge? it shows what class you're in. The freshman gets purple star, sophmores gets bronze star, juniors get silver star and seniors get gold stars." Ryou replied.

You looked at ryous star and it was silver. You understood that and ryou told you the star will be delivered to your house tomorrow. You understood and once you two bid farewell and left, ryou and mana started to go back to their apartment then mana came next to her master.

"Master....I felt something strange from that young man." Mana said.

Ryou looked at you walking out of the building and he narrowed his eyes. He was thinking for moment and then walked, followed by his own shikigami.

"Mana, go to the council room and get some book about the history of this school." Ryou ordered, "I will be looking into it."

"Yes, master." Mana replied.

She then left to get the items while ryou went toward the exit to wait for his shikigami. After moment she got the books and they went to their limo to go back home..

Meanwhile at your home you were...
1151321111222112212.title: meeting upperclassman

11513211112221122121.content:
..Doing some math homework. There were some questions that you were stuck in but thanks to your shikigami you were progressing the question easy. You were wondering about the academy as you could feel something that more then meets the eyes. The school that starts their new semester in fall instead of spring, giving mythical beings as shikigami to the students to study and the people who works for the academy doesn't look ordinary to your eyes.

'I wonder....if this academy is more then just an academy..' you thought to your self.

"Master?"

You got out of your thought and looked at sakura. She looked at you and pointed at the current quesiton. You thanked her as you were drifting away from the homework and resumed the homework

-meanwhile-

At susukino district, ryou finished his homework at the luxurious apartment. He huffed out as mana brought him a cup of water, he took the book that mana brought him at the school and flipped some few pages. The book was about the Japanese history and once he stopped at the page that was about the end of the Tokugawa shogunate, he took some sip of water.

"Master, why have you wanted the book about the history of Japan?" Mana asked.

"...Just gotten curious." Ryou replied.

After he read the pages, he closed the book and put it on the desk and got up. He lived alone as his parents always went abroad to the other country for the business reason and once he gotten downstairs and went toward the kitchen, he got the apron on and gotten ready to make some dinner as mana did the same. He was about to make some szechuan style tofu as he ordered mana to wash some rice. She bowed and once she got the rice and bowl both of them started to make the food.

"You know master? that young boy we met earlier." Mana said.

"what about him?" Ryou asked.

"I personally think he and his shikigami is more then meets the eyes." Mana said.

Ryou stopped cutting the tofu as mana rinsed out some rice and put a new water into the cooking bowl. Ryou was aware about you being more then just an ordinary boy and the shikigami not being normal. Ryou thought for moment and then resumed cutting some tofu.

"They are special, mana. I guess I should look deeper into this first thing in the morning." Ryou said.

"Don't work too hard, master. You know you're still 16." Mana said.

He smiled and continued to cook...
11513211112221122121.title: student to student

115132111122211221211.content:
Next day, you and sakura walked through the neighborhood to go to school. The wind was chilly, but you two endured it. Once you and sakura got to the school and changed shoes, you notice someone standing at the end of the shoe locker. It was ryou and mana, and once two got to them, they noticed you two as you and sakura bowed.

"Good morning, ryou sempai." you greeted.

"Vice versa." Ryou replied.

You and sakura got up and all of you startef to walk. You and sakura noticed the intencity surrounding you and her as you were walking with the student council president. You could even hear the murmur of students who expressing jealousy toward you two.

"Mr.Ayakami." Ryou spoke.

"Y-yes, sempai?" you said.

"Week and half from now, There will be a day where students join the club." ryou said.

You remembered that in Ootomi, the students have mandatory search of the clubs as the school belives in bonding not only with their own shikigami, but students as well. You wondered what club you would join and ryou spoke.

"I truley hope you will find a good club." Ryou said.

"Yes, sempai." you replied.

He nodded and you two bid farewell. Ryou watched you go and mana came close to her master.

"Are you still going to do research on him?" mana asked.

"Indeed. Please tell Isamu that I'll not make on homeroom" ryou replied.

"Yes master." mana replied

She bowed and left as he went to student council room for business..
115132111122211221211.title: next day..

1151321111222112212111.content:
During lunch time you were eating some croquette lunch box with sakura. While you were eating and talking you noticed the shadow loomed. You turn back and saw a giant female oni with muscle. You were little overwhealmed you as she was looking at you two, you noticed an spiky haired boy that was your age stood next to her with his tray of food.

"Is this seat open?" student asked.

"Yeah, it's....it's open." You replied.

He thanked and turned to the oni.

"Lets sit down hanabi." Boy said.

She nodded and walked away from you and sat little far as he sat next to you. You looked at this spiky kid as he took out the disposable chopstick and snapped the middle as the oni did the same, they started to eat some ramen noodles. Sakura was looking at them on and off as she was eating her croquette. You looked at his chest and noticed bronze star on it and then the young man noticed you.

"..Can I help you?" Student asked.

"Oh, ah, nothing." You said, "You're sophmore huh?"

"Yeah, I'm Kanta Tetsuyama and this is my oni shikigami hanabi." He replied.

She nodded with respect as you greeted them as well. You two talked for moment about his experience in this Ootomi. He was part of upper middle class family and he was part of elected students to get into the Ootomi. You were surprised to hear that as you thought only the rich and powerful would come here but he told you that his parents owned some independent mechanic garage so he was not rich or poor.

"Besides, even though I am expected to go to the good mechanic school, I have something that I always done when I was a kid." Kanta said.

"Whats that?" You asked.

"You see, I always wanted to be a fighter since it runs through my mothers blood. I tried to get into boxing club, judo club and other combat based clubs in the past but they're all too vague and not interesting enough. Thats when during my freshmen era, with the approval of the student council and the principle I have made an Fight club!" Kanta said with smile.

You were surprised to hear that as you know many schools in japan, both public and private, have combat based clubs such as the martial art club or wrestling club. You never heard of fight club as you took bite of the croquette.

"So what does your fight club do?" You asked.

"Just as the name goes, we fight. But it's no ordinary fight club as I look through the other clubs, if I see an heated argument that cannot be solved with words, I step in and arrange for the fist fight to determine who's better." Kanta replied.

"Well....I never heard that before." You said.

"Of course, it was made last year." Kanta replied.

You nodded and ate some rice. He asked you where your stars were and you told him it didn't arrive yet. He understood as sometime it get late since the stars are precious after all. After moment of talk you guys noticed the lunch was almost over. He smiled and got up as hanabi did the same lifting the tray up.

"Well, I have to go." Kanta said, "And by the way, just to let you know that next tuesday is when students start to join the club."

"Really, thanks for the info." You replied.

"no problem. I hope you'll join the fight club." Kanta responded with smile.

"I'll look into it." You replied.

you all bid farewell and once you ate the lunch the bell rang and both you and sakura wrapped up the bento box and went out to go to your next class. You and sakura walked fastly and got to the social study room and got inside and sat to your seat.
1151321111222112212111.title: During lunch..

11513211112221122121111.content:
Meanwhile at the student council, Ryou was doing some paper work as he was aware that the day of joining clubs were fast approaching and it was his job to look over it. Moment later, someone came into the room. The two were both female but one on the left were short grey hair and big boob and carrying a katana on her hip while girl on the right had long chestnut hair with some boobs on her. their shikigami came in as the one in left had lynx shikigami while the one on the right had wolf shikigami.

"Hi ryou, how's going?" Short haired girl asked.

"I'm fine Shizue. How are you, chizuru?" Ryou replied while working.

"good as usual, sir!" long hair girl said.

The Short haired girls name was Shizue Kuro and the long haired girls name was Chizuru Shikiyouin, and they were part of the student council with different position as Shizue was secretariat of the council, she also enforces the law and order brought by the principle while chizuru was the treasurer the council who also manages the expense and the budget of the school from cafeteria food to teachers budget. The two girls sat down as the wolf shikigami went to make some tea for the two. Mana was still behind ryou as he put the pen down, he looked forward.

"Chizuru, is the school have enough finance for the club entrance day next tuesday?" Ryou asked.

"Let me see....yep, we have." Chizuru replied.

That was what you said when you reached the Ootomi high school, the school in hokkaido, japan that only the rich people goes to. It was a luck that you, the middle class girl, to be here. The students mumbled as you and them were surprised to hear that. Sachiko continued to talk that she will take students one by one to give them the specific shikigami to own. As the line were made, you were the last. You sighed but didn't care as you liked to wait. As you came to the principle, she gave you a paper with four picture.

"Now then, you have a choice: an bakeneko, tanooki, inari, or an oni. Bakeneko is very friendly and always keep you away from being sad. And the oni is the strongest, so if you need someone to defend you, she is the one." Sachiko said.

He noticed Ms.Sachiko and the shikigami and he stopped writing and the three bowed to him lightly.

"I expected you to come earlier, Ms.Sachiko." Man said.

"I apologize for the lateness, Academy Master Tanaka." Ms.Sachiko replied.

The mans name was Tanaka Jiro, the man who funds the whole Ootomi Academy from school Items to Employees paycheck. He was also the provider of the shikigami eggs since he was also the elder Shinto priest. Reason he funds here is because he loves to see the children grow with education and making bonds with the shikigami. Tanaka got up from the chair and walked side as Ms.Sachiko got up from the bow and then he spoke to her.

"Ms.Sachiko, I have heard a word that one of the freshmen of this school is actually from an middle-class." Tanaka said, "Is that true?"

"Yes, Academy Master. His name is Kondo Ayakami, son of Umi Ayakami, my childhood friend." Ms.Sachiko replied.

Jiro was thinking for moment and then turned his attention to her.

"Ms.Sachiko. I understand that you want this academy to be open to anyone, even to the unfortunate. But you must understand that we're not running a charity on the enrollment." Tanaka said.

"Yes, it's true. I have done this out of my selfish way, just so my friends son would have the same education and her." Ms.Sachiko said, "If you wish to fire me, then please do."

Jiro thought for moment as though he was known for having some strict rules but in secret he was a soft man. He never wanted to harm anyone who were in bad situation, and Ms.Sachiko was one of them as she came from the poor working class. It was Jiro who gave her the job as a janitor of the Ootomi and when the previous principle quit work he put her as the next principle. He thought for moment and then sighed.

"Ms.Sachiko. I will let this through since you had hard time. But if you are going to do something like this again, please tell me beforehand." Jiro said.

"Yes, Academy Master." Ms.Sachiko replied.

As you were all walking home, Miwa was talking about the clothes Kenshi had summon for you... until she bump into some hooded person. Lucky, the bag he was carrying served as a soft landing for her fall.

"Ah, sorry! We didn't see you there." You said.

The hooded man didn't say anything, he looked at you with a smile that's somehow familiar to you. Kenshi came to Miwa who is wrestling with the bag, he made a disgusted face when he looked at Kenshi. You were wondering what's wrong so you ask him.

...

As Kenshi was helping Miwa, the witch got a good view of what is inside the bag. It was... school uniforms? And to top it off, the uniform that's in front of Miwa had her name on the tag. The hooded figure quickly took that bag and ran off.

--End of flashback--

you and Souta realized what he meant: even if they had some power, they might be outsmarted or be hurt without them. You and Souta sweated, and Alice continued to look at them until she sighed and turned her attention to masuo.

While you, Souta, Masuo, and Nelly make your way to the park. Kenshi and Miwa follow the thief into the small forest area until they got to a clearing that looks fit for a duel. The thief took off the hood and it turned out that Souta was right, it was Itsuki. He looked around and said.

"You can stop using your chameleon ability sweetheart." Itsuki said.

"Who is he talking to?" Miwa spoke to Kenshi.

"Don't know, but let's stay hidden for a little longer." Kenshi replied back.

A few seconds later, a female person with lizard like eyes and tail appeared out of nowhere. The spellcasters were amazed that the shikigami has the ability to hide like that.

"No way, a shikigami? How did he get one?" Kenshi spoke.

"I think we're about to found out, look." Miwa replied.

The spellcasters continue to stay put as the felon and his shikigami walk toward the center of the clearing where they met up with a man in a fine suite, in other words, his client.

"Good afternoon Itsuki, how did the job go?" The cilent asked.

"It went well at first, until that teacher with the tiger smack me from behind." The felon replied. "Good thing the shikigami you gave me helped me out back there."

"Not mentioning that warlock burnt my master's face!" The lizard shiki spoke. "He's going to pay for this!"

"Not now friend, wait till we're out of the clear first." Itsuki said. "Now then, let's get down to business."

Kenshi and Miwa knew what's going on, Itsuki was given a shikigami to do the dirty work for someone. But who is his client? Is he a felon as well? Either way Miwa was ready to stop them, and Kenshi too. Kenshi didn't want his school outfit to tear up if it turns out to be a battle, so he cast a spell to turn his wear to his other one where the silver haired warlock was wearing black pants, dark blue shirt, dark purple/red mage cloak and scarf. (Something like this http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/powe... )

"Holy holstaur! You look awesome, I take that's your personal wear?" Miwa smiled.

"Yeah, lets go!" Kenshi replied.

Miwa took to the skies as Kenshi took ground combat. Miwa cast her first spell to create a giant wall of emerald to block the villain's escape route. Itsuki and his shiki was caught surprised by this, but his client remained calm.

"Itsuki, I thought your shiki said, nobody is following us?" The client asked.

"They must of used their chibi mode!" The lizard replied.

"Tsk, tsk, tsk. You disappointed me Itsuki, I thought you're better then this?" The client mocked the felon.

"What?! All we need to do is kill these bozos and we'll be done with it!" The felon shouted.

"Very well, just to let you know, you call for this, not me." The client replied as two more shikigami appear.

The two shikigami that joined in is another lizard shikigami, but this one is male. And the other one is... some sort of gigantic blob-ish youkai that had a plump stomach.
1253122221112111111112111121111111221122.title: Meanwhile

1253122221112111111112111121111111221122.content:
The battle raged for a couple of minutes, Kenshi was using magic swords, magic missiles, and earth spikes while Miwa was covering him with icy mines, wind boomerangs, and sparks that home in the enemy. Even though their master were not around, the lizard shikigami had one major flaw, they were only a couple days old and had yet to mastered their abilities.

"I guess training with Kenshi was worth it after all." Miwa spoke happily.

"Rahhh! For my master!" Yelled the lizard shiki as she tried to slash Kenshi.

"Predictable!" Said Kenshi as he counter attack with a magic sword.

As the female lizard backed off, she quickly use her chameleon ability, hoping if she could attack Kenshi off-guard. Miwa took note of this and cast 8 homing sparks that easily found her, thus canceling her chameleon ability.

"Man, I love magic attacks with enemy targeting." Miwa smiled. "Not even hidden enemies can hide from me."

The lizard shikigami were losing the fight against the witch and the warlock, yet the client haven't used his other shikigami. The felon was getting worried by this and said.

"Damn, your worthless shikigami aren't going to win against those bozos!" Itsuki said.

"Calm down, I still have a tricks on my sleeves." The client spoke. "Now then, I think it's time for one of you, to fall."

The client gave a nod to one of the lizard shikigami and he understood, he ran up a tree and jump to knock Miwa off her broom. Then that plump shikigami shot out his large long tongue and wrapped around Miwa's body and she was caught.

"Miwa! No!" Kenshi shouted.

"Oh my, what a lucky catch. I've always dreamed of wrapping my tongue around a smoking hot witch, dreams can come true!" The tongue shiki greedily played with Miwa with his tongue. "You're like a ripe fruit, tasty and delicious."

"Careful. If you fight back, I might just make this tasty witch my next meal." The tongue shiki spoke.

"Why you..." Kenshi grind his teeth.

"Don't even think about casting the spell! Or else this girl is going to pay for it!" The lizard man replied.

As much as Kenshi hated it, he had no choice. He couldn't let Miwa get hurt. He cancel the incantation and didn't move a muscle.

"Good. Now stay still." Said the client.

The first lizard shiki rushed toward the warlock and slash him in the chest, causing him to reeled back for a couple steps from the attack. Then the other one spun her tail around, sending a large impact that threw Kenshi to the ground. Miwa couldn't stand to watch Kenshi getting beaten up like this. She tried to break free, but the tongue was quiet sticky and she was coated in saliva.

"Stop it! Leave him alone! He can't defend himself like this!" Miwa continue to struggle.

"Hush now my darling. That bastard will soon be no more." The tongue shikigami resume playing Miwa with his tongue. "This is like a erotic fantasy story! Only a hundred times better!"

"And how is it better?" Itsuki looked over.

"For starters there's... this!"

The tongue shiki moved the tip of the tongue into Miwa's cleavage and exposed her bust. Miwa screamed with embarrassment as the villains and their shikigami looked on drooling and with pervy looks in their eyes.

"Wow! Those are some nice bosoms and a sexy bra!" Said the lizard man.

"You could say that again!" Said the female one.

"YOU PERVERTS!!! I'LL FREEZE YOU ALL FOR ETERTAL FOR THIS!!!" Miwa yelled as she struggle with all of her might.

When Kenshi heard Miwa screaming he looked up and saw what was going on. The lizard shiki were advancing toward him, and in the background he saw what that tongue shiki was doing to Miwa. When he saw what was going on he get up on his feet, however the injures he has suffered has started to take it's toll. He couldn't do anything, but watch.

'Dammit, their going to get away with this!' Kenshi thought. 'Am I just going to sit here and die while she gets treated like this?!'

"Ha! Fuck the count system, this is way more justifiable then a lazy ass judge can bring up!" Itsuki laughed. "So kid, got any last words?"

Kenshi stood and said nothing. The client order his shikigami to launch the killing blow.

"Kenshi! NOOOOO!!!" Miwa yelled as tears started to form.

Kenshi closed his eyes and waited for the final slash that would end him. However the attack didn't connect as it was deflect by someone. He opened his eyes and it was blocked by...
1253122221112111111112111121111111221122.title: Wounded Fight

1253122221112111111112111121111111221122.content:
By a young man with black hair and wearing... red school uniform? Kenshi can sense the magic within him, in other words, a warlock!

"What the? Who the hell are you?" The lizard shikigami asked.

"Oh no, they already catch on?" The client spoke.

The unknown warlock looked at the client with gray eyes, and gave a look that said 'You're life is my' he then looked at Kenshi and said.

"You're in no condition to take on those lowlifes, stay back." The warlock said.

"What? But I have to help Miwa!" Kenshi replied.

"Don't worry, this will be done..." The warlock smiled. "...With 3 attacks."

The warlock took a few steps forward, Kenshi didn't knew who this person is, but he's definitely not from Ootomi since the emblem doesn't match with his. The client was too a scared to move, he wasn't expecting THEY would find him. The first lizard shiki rush to claw him down, but he pull out a doll and from mere inches, the lizard was under the voodoo influence. The warlock then slam the doll to the ground in turn the shiki did the same, turning it back into a egg... with the same unknown emblem on it.

"Strike 1..."

The second lizard used her chameleon ability to attack him unseen, the warlock closed his eyes and waited for the sound of footsteps. Once he heard them, he went into some sort of countering state as he was wait for the attack. The attack connected and the warlock instantly teleported behind the lizard shiki with ring of kunai form by metal magic around her. A snap was made, and the ring of magic kunai stab her to death turning her into a egg as well.

"Strike 2..."

The warlock looked at the tongue shiki who had Miwa captured. He made a couple of steps toward them, causing the tongue shikigami quiver in fear. He completely forgotten about Miwa, until he remember he had her captured. He threated not to come closer, or he'll swallow the witch. The warlock didn't listen so he started to pull Miwa in. The warlock cast a small lightning spark that touched Miwa and giving her an electric aura, keeping her safe and zapping the tongue shikigami to death, and turning him into an egg.

"Strike 3..."

Once Miwa was freed she fix up her clothes then ran over to Kenshi, as the warlock continue to make his way to felon and the client.

"Miwa, are you ok?" Kenshi said.

"Yeah, just slimy that's all." Miwa replied. "But you centrally aren't!"

Miwa was checking the wound until they heard screams from where the unknown warlock is. They looked and saw the felon chained to the ground, and his client with a scythe up to his neck!

"I yield! I yield! Please don't hurt me!" The client said.

"Aww, that's too bad. I was hoping me and my master would bring you back headless." The warlock smirk. "But double cross my master again, and I'll show how beautiful death really is."

The client nodded and he was then trap in that prison orb like the felon was. Miwa helped Kenshi to walk toward the warlock as he put away his scythe.

"Are you and boobilocks alright?" He spoke.

"Yeah, t-thanks for helping us, but who are you?" Kenshi asked.

"...Izayoi, I'm sure you two can tell that I'm a warlock." Izayoi replied.

"I see, Izayoi. Well I'm Miwa and he's Kenshi, let us repay you for helping us." Miwa smiled, then yelled. "AND DON'T CALL ME BOOBILOCKS!"

"Heh. Nah, I'm good." Izayoi calmly smiled.

"What? Come on, you saved us back there. There has to be something on your mind for an reward." Kenshi replied.

"Heh, No thanks." Izayoi said as he vanish into a dark blur along with the client and the three eggs.

"He's gone. Izayoi was it?" Kenshi said. "I have to admit, those were some pretty impressive magic skills."

"Agreed, let's bring this felon back and explain to the others." Miwa said. "Kenshi hold on, let me heal you up."

Miwa didn't had very much magic, but it was enough to ease the pain. Kenshi couldn't help but blush at this, he felt like he knew Miwa so much to the point like she's his girlfr...

'Aww, cut it out Kenshi. We're only like 2 weeks old.' Kenshi thought then spoke. "T-Thanks."

"No problem, come on let's go." Miwa replied.

1253122221112111111112111121111111221122.title: story of my life

1253122221112111111112111121111111221122.content:
...Next to you. Sen thanked ms.moriyama and walked toward the seat. You didn't know the reason, but you had a gut feeling that she was one powerful girl and once she got to her seat, she smiled at you two and got to her seat as izayoi got to his chibi mode.

"H-hi there. I'm Shizuku Shichibana, and he's kenshi, my warlock shikigami." You greeted with whisper.

"Sen Mamorigawa, and he is izayoi." She replied with nod.

He nodded and you could see that they are mannerful, and when you turned to kenshi you saw him with serious look in his face. He was looking at izayoi until the warlock saw him and kenshi turned back. Izayoi looked at kenshi for moment then went back to his business.

"Something wrong?" you asked kenshi.

"...no, nothing." kenshi replied.

After bell rang, everyone got up to go to the first class..
1253122221112111111112111121111111221122.title: next to you

1253122221112111111112111121111111221122.content:
At your first class, you were mixing some basic chemicals that would be useful in the future class. you were still pondering about that girl sen, wondering about what she is and how she got into the elite school. You were continuing to ponder until your shikigami called your name, making you mixing wrong chemical and it made an mushroom cloud. You were surprised and kenshi were as well as the smoke were in the celing, kusakichi came to you and looked at the celing then turned back to you.

"missstake, I sssee." kusakichi said.

"I'm so sorry! I will clean up!" you replied.

"Don't worry, thats just minor accident." teacher replied.

She told you that everything will be fine and resume to the study. You thanked the teacher and continued to do your class. After few more classes, you havnt seen sen around until you saw her walking away. You had this gut feeling that you should at least follow her even though kenshi told you it would be dangerous. You quietly followed her and when she turned the corner, you stopped and got on the wall and peeked out. She saw sen standing and further down you saw both alice and masuo standing as well. You and kenshi wondered what they would do and then sen spoke up/

"So this is where you were attending, alice goldfield." Sen said.

"Yeah, got problem with that?" Alice replied.

You and kenshi wondered if they knew each other and then sen continued to speak.

"Heh, I thought you would go to the normal rich girls school, rather then here." sen spoke.

"At least I have brains to come here." Alice replied.

"..And your arrogance too, just like your dead father." Sen replied.

You were surprised to hear that her father is dead, then both you and kenshi heard an clashing noise, revealing xiao lin and izayoi clashing each other with their respective power. They were powerful, and alice were looking at sen with hateful, gleering eyes.

"Hold your tongue! Dont you dare talk trash about my father!" Alice demanded.

"Your dead father was good, but not good enough with my father....Why, before he became wealthy, he was nothing more then a thug." Sen replied.

The student president gotten mad and was about to attack sen. You wanted to help stop then nelly jumped in the middle and drew her sword, pointed at alice and summoned a smaller sword and pointed at sen. They stopped as your shikigami were about to use his magic as well, and then masuo clapped his hands.

"Now now ladies, please stop." Masuo said, "student president, she's a senior, so you should respect her. Sen sempai, please don't interrogate us since we're juniors"

Nellys sword were close as izayoi were ready to kill both xiao lin and nelly, sen just sighed and ordered him to stop. He understood and got back as alice did the same. You sighed in relief that there would be no violence, then sen spoke to the student president.

"You might have become more powerful, but continue to be arrogant, and you will go same path as your father." Sen said, "now excuse me..."

She then left the scene. masuo just comforted alice as you were about to leave...
1253122221112111111112111121111111221122.title: powerful student

choices: Your big sis and her shikigami
1253122221112111111112111121111111221122.content:
...A valkyrie! it was nelly and she was in her armor and had a sword that deflected the attack and she immediatly swiped the enemy off. The lizard shikigami backed off as the criminal and the client were surprised to see the valkyrie standing before them. You and others arrived to the scene and masuo came front with nelly and looked at the criminal with serious face.

"You two! I don't know how you have gotten the shikigami, but I will stop you all!" masuo said.

"ha! how can a runt could possibly do, even for a valkyrie!?" criminal said.

Masuo then turned to nelly and nodded. She nodded back and got into her fighting stance. The criminal ordered two of the lizard shikigami to attack her and as they rushed toward her, the aura begun to surround nelly and within second she dashed and passed the two shikigami and ran toward the tongue shikigami. The criminals didn't know what happened until the two lizard screamed and flew, twisting their body and turned themselves into eggs. The client and the criminal were in shock to see this as nelly was getting close to the tongue shiki and he was holding miwa.

"Y-You won't do anything! if you attack me, she will be dead!" tongue shikigami said.

"Let's see if that's true." Nelly replied.

She then disappeared, making the tongue shikigami and miwa confused then suddenly from the top nelly came down slicing the shikigami half with her sword. The tongue shikigami screamed, letting miwa go and turned itself into an egg. Both client and the criminal were in shock as you and kenshi were amazed to see the fight end so quickly.

"That was...amazing." you said.

"They are more then meets the eye.." kenshi replied.

"Of course, I am in the disciplinary division of the student council." Masuo replied.

Masuo then told you and souta that he will take care of the criminals so you all should go home. You and souta nodded as your friend went to get his shikigami, you all parted with masu and left the scene. You were giving kenshi a lift as he was slowly healing, he was little embarressed that he was being carried by a girl. After you and souta bid farewell, you and kenshi went inside and went to your room. Once you put kenshi on your bed, you told him to lay down for while. He understood and once you got down a bell rang, and you opened the door and saw...
1253122221112111111112111121111111221122.title: quick victory
