12531222222.title: Japanese Chimera

12532.content:
You decided to pick kappa as your shikigami. You told the lady principle what you decided and she nodded. She told the instructor to hand over the egg and once he came to you, he handed over a blue/green colored egg. It was actually big for an egg as it was slightly more bigger than the ostrich egg and had a school emblem on the middle. You looked closely and noticed the egg started to make crack and made a bright light, engulfing the whole room. You covered your eyes as the principle and the instructors put the sunglasses on, and once the light were gone, you noticed the egg were gone.

"Where did it go?" you spoke.

Just then, you felt some sort of water splash on your back and once you turned around, you saw a blue haired boy who were around 13 years chuckling. You were blushing as he was also naked and you saw his...well, his 'down there'. Sachiko noticed your blushing and chuckled little and the boy came to you.

"Sorry about that ma'am. I am the kappa shiki, and I'm glad you chose me." Boy said.

"Please put some cloth on!" You demanded, still blushing.

Sachiko told the instructor to hand over the cloth and once he did, the kappa thanked the person and put the cloth on. After that, sachiko applauded to you with smile.

"Good work, my friend. He will now be your new shikigami. Now, why don't you name him?" Sachiko said.

You thought for moment and looked at his blue/green eyes.

"Ok then, I'll call you...kyuuri (cucumber)!" you said.

The kappa were surprised to hear that then smiled.

"If that's my name, then I'll take it." he responded.

You and kyuuri then bid farewell to sachiko and left the ground. As you two walked, you told kyuuri about yourself and he listened to you carefully. Moment later, you two went back to the house and once you got in, you were greeted by..
12532.title: technological shiki

13.content: The year was 2000, and the year was great for the high school of ootomi as the new enrollments had excellent choices of students and faculties. The principle had the best wish that it would stay like this forever, and leaned back on the chair sipping on the black coffee he ordered from good part of central america. The school bell rang and the students lined up for the meeting from the principle and he congratulated them for getting into the school and wished best for them and they students clapped their hands. They then handed over the eggs that they can have to retrieve shikigami . as the ritual ended for the day the principle went to the facility lounge to talk with the faculties staff and they bowed to him.
13.title: story that starts all

131.content:
Next day approached and the students were at their classroom for their homeroom. At the office, one female were writing the rules of conducts for the students. She was Sachiko Hanamichi, 23 years old who had success in getting the degree on teaching. She was focusing on teaching at normal collage until the principle of ootomi consider her to work at the private high school. She was little skeptical at first but took the offer. At the ritual ceremony, she took Inari fox as her Shikigami and she didn’t regret her choice.

“Say master, are you finished with the writing?” Shikigami asked.

“Almost shoko, after few more line and...done.” Sachiko said.

She leaned back and stretched and got up to put the rule of conducts on the bulletin board. As she got up and out with her Shikigami, she noticed that few faculties were walking toward the room. Sachiko bowed to them and greeted them as they did the same, she went to do her business. As she walked through the hallway, Shoko spoke up to her master.

“I hear that your not rich nor upper classed person.” Shoko said.

“Well, I did come from Kushiro. My father is a fisherman and my mother was a district attorney.” Sachiko replied.

“Then why became a faculty here in ootomi? Or being a teacher?” Shoko asked.

“I like children a lot, and I wanted to teach so I took the teacher doctrine and became one. And for why I’m here, let’s just say the principle wanted me here more then other.” Sachiko replied.

“Why? It’s sounds like you don’t have choices and such.” Shoko asked.

“No, I had a choice. I just had the opportunity to get into a good place, that’s all.” Sachiko replied.

Shoko just ‘hm’ at her as they got to the bulletin board, she put it on and put a drawing pin on and begun to go back to the faculty room. The bell rang and Sachiko saw many students get out of room for their room for their first class.

“I better get to my room as well.” Sachiko said.

They both then walked faster and 4 minutes later they got to the room and went in.

“Good morning students. I am Sachiko Hanamichi, your math teacher and she is Shoko, my inari Fox Shikigami. I do hope we can get along for this year.” Sachiko said.

The students bowed to her and sat down as she started to teach...
131.title: The faculty

1311.content:
After 30 minutes of class the bell rang and both the sudents and their respective Shikigami bowed to her and left the class. Sachiko sighed in reliefs that she made the first class.

“You’re doing great master.” Shoko said with smile.

“Thank you shoko. I think I couldn’t go through it without your assistance.” Sachiko replied.

“I’m just a Shikigami who serves their master, master Sachiko.” Shoko replied.

She smiled and gotten ready for the next set of students to come in to teach. As 5 minutes rolled, the next students came in with their Shikigami. She introduced again and then one of the student rose his hand.

“Yes, Toshi kun?” Sachiko spoke.

“Did you come from rich family? Or something great.” Toshi asked.

“Well, not really. I’m just your average middle class citizen of Japan.” Sachiko answered.

This mad the students mumble and turn their heads at eatch other, then Toshi spoke up again.

“Then why are you appointed here as the teacher? This is top class private high school, you know?” Toshi asked.

Sachiko thought for moment then Shoko came front.

“Let’s just concentrate on your study, young man. Anyone can land on good job if they work hard.” Shoko said.

The mumbling ended and decided to do the study. Sachiko thanked Shoko for the defense and she just nodded, and the study went ahead...
1311.title: End of first class

13111.content:
The day were finished and the students bid farewell to Sachiko and they slowly went back home. Sachiko and Shoko went to the faculty room to do some work for next day. As they got to the room she noticed a paper on her desk and once she picked up the paper, it wrote:

Go back home, low life!

Sachiko were little shocked to see this as if she got an threatening letter. Shoko were disturbed by this and was about to seek who wrote the letter but Sachiko stopped her.

“But master! Someone threatened you! This is unacceptable!” Shoko said.

“I know, I will not take this lightly but I will not give in to such petty insult.” Sachiko replied.

She looked around, noticing some faculties looking at her but returned to their work. She sighed and sat down until one man with parkers on and a female with dog ears and a tail came to her.

“Are you Alright ms.sachiko?” Man asked.

“I’m alright mr.mashira.” She replied.

His name was Mashira Touta, a gym teacher and his partner Shiro. They have been working at ootomi for over 13 years and they were one of well respected faculty/Shikigami partner. He overlooked at the threatning letter and smiled, petted her shoulder.

“Don’t worry ms.sachiko, we are your allies so if you two have problems, talk to us.” Touta said.

“Thank you, mr.Mashira.” Sachiko said with smile.

They then went to their work..
13111.title: Extra work

131111.content:
Month went by since that day, and Sachiko gotten used to the teaching career at ootomi. Many students joined the clubs to fulfill their mind and body after school, and Sachiko were doing her best to keep her job well done despite some harassment from rich students and some faculty for her background. During break, Sachiko and Shoko were having sandwiches until one faculty came.

“Ms.sachiko,the principle needs your attention.” Faculty spoke.

“Oh, yes sir.” Sachiko replied.

She puts the food away and both Sachiko and shoko went toward the principles office. Once arrived, she knocked the door and went inside. The principle were writing something on the paper and once done he puts it away and turns his attention to her.

“Do you wish to see me sir?” Sachiko asked.

“Yes. I hear that some students and the faculty’s are harassing you for some reason.” Principle said.

“Well, Yes...they know my background and they despite it.” Sachiko replied.

Principle sighed and leaned back on his chair.

“I guess it can’t be helped. We rarely hire any person who have normal background.” Principle said, “I know it’s hard, but please bare with it.”

“Yes, sir.” Sachiko replied.

With that, he dismissed her and she went back to the faculty room. As they walked, Sachiko bumped into one of the student and she stares at her.

“Sorry about that.” Sachiko said.

“Don’t bump on me again, you low life! Get out of this school!” Student said.

This made Shoko mad and told her to hold her mouth but she just ran away with her shikigami.

“Are you Alright Master?” Shoko asked.

“Don’t worry, I’m fine.” Sachiko replied.

“Those students, how dare they insult my master like that.” Shoko said with anger.

Sachiko then petted her head. Shoko looked at her and noticed her graceful look as if it didn’t bother her.

“Like I said, don’t worry.” Sachiko said.

“If..you say so..” shoko replies, blushing little.

As they finished, the bell rang and the two quickly went to the faculty room to get the stuff and went to the room for the class to teach...
131111.title: Month went by

info.brief_description: Story on new student on special school
info.description:
In this story, your a new student in the special school where only the aristocratic one goes, and it is very...unique to the others. In this story, the rules will follow:

1.No scat, foot, lesibian, or BL fetish (vore is good, but make it mild as possible.)

2.Giantess is ok, but make it gentle one.

3.Nudity is ok as well, but don't make it TOO detailed.

Other then that, enjoy putting some story :D+
